Bow_1.description: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.
Bow_1.name: Hunter's Bow

Bow_2.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.
Bow_2.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow

Bow_3.description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
Bow_3.name: Messenger
Bow_3.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional 100~200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Bow_4.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
Bow_4.name: Alley Hunter
Bow_4.effect: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2~4% every second up to a max of 20~40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4~8% per second until it reaches 0%.

Bow_5.description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires the more.
Bow_5.name: Amos' Bow
Bow_5.effect: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8~16% every 0.1 seconds up to 5 times.

Catalyst_1.description: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.
Catalyst_1.name: Apprentice's Notes

Catalyst_2.description: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.
Catalyst_2.name: Pocket Grimoire

Catalyst_3.description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyunjian north of Liyue. It is small, light, and durable.
Catalyst_3.name: Emerald Orb
Catalyst_3.effect: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20~40% for 12s.

Catalyst_4.description: A mysterious catalyst made of blackstone. It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.
Catalyst_4.name: Blackcliff Agate
Catalyst_4.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Catalyst_5.description: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.
Catalyst_5.name: Everlasting Moonglow
Catalyst_5.effect: Healing Bonus increased by 10~20%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by 1~2.0% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

Claymore_1.description: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains, if wielded with enough willpower.
Claymore_1.name: Waster Greatsword

Claymore_2.description: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.
Claymore_2.name: Old Merc's Pal

Claymore_3.description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
Claymore_3.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
Claymore_3.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12~24%.

Claymore_4.description: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou". The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.
Claymore_4.name: Akuoumaru
Claymore_4.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Claymore_5.description: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.
Claymore_5.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
Claymore_5.effect: DEF is increased by 28~56%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 40~80% of DEF.

Polearm_1.description: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.
Polearm_1.name: Beginner's Protector

Polearm_2.description: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.
Polearm_2.name: Iron Point

Polearm_3.description: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.
Polearm_3.name: Black Tassel

Polearm_4.description: A weapon made of blackstone and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.
Polearm_4.name: Blackcliff Pole
Polearm_4.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Polearm_5.description: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...
Polearm_5.name: Engulfing Lightning
Polearm_5.effect: ATK increased by 28~56% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of 80~120% ATK. Gain 30~50% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

Sword_1.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.
Sword_1.name: Dull Blade

Sword_2.description: A sword for chasing away demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.
Sword_2.name: Silver Sword

Sword_3.description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
Sword_3.name: Cool Steel
Sword_3.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12~24%.

Sword_4.description: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.
Sword_4.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
Sword_4.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Sword Billet, 50x Amethyst Lump, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Sword_4.effect: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates 6~12 Energy for each seed consumed.

Sword_5.description: The sword of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil—just like the last heroine who wielded it.
Sword_5.name: Aquila Favonia
Sword_5.effect: ATK is increased by 20~40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100~160% of ATK and dealing 200~320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
